title: Cross-training-based CBVLE Learning Course for Enhancing Nursing Dosage Calculation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computation skills and foundational knowledge of nursing science
context.additional_context: Conducted in a classroom setting using digital devices (tablets/PCs), operating weekly 2-hour instructional sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can independently solve medication dosage calculation problems with 95% accuracy
Learners can explain at least three error prevention strategies through analysis of medication error case studies
Learners enhance practical application skills by completing over 80% of cross-training tasks provided in the CBVLE environment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
